metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40474 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: [Integer overflow leading to heap overwrite in MXF file handling with uncompressed video]

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad0.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gst-plugins-bad1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
